member.name: M:LogitechInterface.LogitechLcd.LcdColorSetBackground(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sets the specified bitmap image as the background on the color LCd
member.param:
The array of pixles to display on the device. 320 bytes wide by 240 bytes high. Since the color LCD can display full color, 4 bytes per picture are used. The size of the bitmap is 320x240x4 = 307200. The bytes are arranged like this:
Pixel 0, 0 ... Pixel 319, 0
B G R A ... B G R A
... ... ...
Pixel 0, 239 ... Pixel 319, 239
B G R A ... B G R A
B - Blue 0 - 255
G - Green 0 - 255
R - Red 0 - 255 A - Alpha 0 - 255
member.returns: True if successful, false if not
